text: Hyloxalus borjai is a frog. It lives in Colombia. Scientists have seen this frog in exactly one place: Amalfi, in Antioquia Department. Scientists saw this frog between 1000 and 1500 meters above sea level. Scientists think the tadpoles swim in streams. Scientists do not know if the frog is in danger. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Hyloxalus borjai
